explains: n. 抽象；提取；抽象概念；空想；心不在焉

sentences.en: Is it worth fighting a big war, in the name of an abstraction like sovereignty?
sentences.cn: 以象主权这样一个抽象概念的名义，值得打一场大战吗？

sentences.en: But across society, the abstraction of the idea of cash makes me uneasy.
sentences.cn: 但在整个社会，对现金概念的抽象让我感到不安。

sentences.en: Has not twentieth-century art shown that naturalism does not necessarily follow abstraction in some kind of predetermined sequence?
sentences.cn: 二十世纪的艺术不是已经表明，自然主义不一定遵循某种既定顺序的抽象了吗？
